ValidationRule.description: Reps can't add products or do other changes after the opportunity is moved into Closing.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closing'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Operations Processing'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Ready to Ship'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Won'), ISPICKVAL(StageName,'Closed Lost') ),
NOT(OR( ($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), (CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"Finance")), ($Profile.Name="Order Operations Admin"), CONTAINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator") )),
ISCHANGED ( Amount ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can't add products or edit discounts after the opportunity is moved into Closing.
